abstract: New Museum's retrospective of Belgian-born artist Carsten Holler, which features devices and environments like a plastic adult-sized slide and sensory deprivation tank, plunges visitors into topsy-turvy experience with scientific undertones.
snippet: The Carsten Höller exhibition that opens on Wednesday at the New Museum takes the idea of “visitor experience” to new heights.
lead_paragraph: The Carsten Höller exhibition that opens on Wednesday at the New Museum takes the idea of “visitor experience” to new heights.

headline.main: Is It Art, Science or a Test of People?
headline.print_headline: Is It Art, Science Or a Test Of People?
headline.seo: Carsten Höller Exhibition at the New Museum
